name: music-ensemble-scheduler-2025
description: A comprehensive web application for scheduling and managing rehearsals for musical groups.

scripts.start: echo "This is a monorepo. Please run scripts in the respective packages." && exit 1
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: DX AG
